thread.title: China holds live-fire drills, raising Taiwan tension

title: China holds live-fire drills, raising Taiwan tension
text:
China holds live-fire drills, raising Taiwan tension Thursday, April 19, 2018 - 02:05 
China state TV says Beijing's military conducted live-fire drills along the southeast coastline but is unclear if these were the same exercises as had been flagged as taking place in the sensitive Taiwan Strait. Ryan Brooks reports.   
China state TV says Beijing's military conducted live-fire drills along the southeast coastline but is unclear if these were the same exercises as had been flagged as taking place in the sensitive Taiwan Strait. Ryan Brooks reports.  //reut.rs/2JXEisJ
